title: Photophysical properties of Pt(II) complexes based on the benzoquinoline (bzq) ligand with OLED implication: a theoretical study
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,20278-20289
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA03334E, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Batool Moradpour, Reza Omidyan
The photophysical properties of eight Pt(II) complexes were investigated using high-level DFT and TD-DFT models, revealing their potential applications in OLED devices.
